name: retro_css_generator
description: Generates authentic early 2000s retro CSS styling for components and layouts. Produces table-based layouts, garish gradients, beveled borders, cursed fonts, and IE6-era visual patterns.

description.description: Brief description of the component's purpose and desired aesthetic

cursed_level.description: How aggressively retro/cursed the styling should be

css_code.description: Complete CSS code with retro 2000s styling

fonts.description: List of cursed fonts to use (Comic Sans, Papyrus, etc.)

notes.description: Additional styling tips for authentic 2000s feel

input.description: Navigation button for back/forward in browser toolbar

output.css_code: .retro-button { background: linear-gradient(180deg, #ECE9D8 0%, #D4D0C8 100%); border: 2px outset #FFFFFF; padding: 4px 12px; font-family: 'Tahoma', sans-serif; font-size: 11px; cursor: pointer; } .retro-button:active { border-style: inset; }
output.notes: Use outset border for 3D effect, inset when pressed. Keep text small and crisp.
